Reviews.Title: disatisfied
Reviews.Author: tlz4110
Reviews.Content: I will never buy from this place again.Bought a phone and tried to connect and the phone carrier said they couldn't connect it and who ever I bought it from knew it couldn't be hooked up!!!Very disappointed in my purchace!The time and effort going to my phone company just for them to say they couldn't do it was embarrassing!
